https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eKpzbERuhogYTwI3PwfVsAHXnuO.jpg A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened. Badla
